A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it this afternoon\, two and half hours of drivel and wastes opportunities. Pointless story and characters you couldn't give two hoots about. I was praying for the Empire to wipe out the rebels purely because they're all now just so utterly annoying! Honestly\, what a pile of tosh. I'd geared myself to not expect too much but Christ it failed waaaaay below my lowest expectations.
